title: Is We Dumb? | Triceratops. Fork. Asteroid. Stepmom.
description:
FINALLY! Joe's lifelong quest to find a tangible use for throw pillows is over! And it involves a wiener because of course it does. Let's talk about that, people that really care about forks, screaming at your wife for being too high, getting gum stuck in your pubes, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/Xe8Iob81das
